jam.commands
Class AbstractCommand

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      jam.commands.AbstractCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.Action, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, java.util.EventListener, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSetBooleanPreference, AbstractShowDialog
public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction
implements Commandable

Implementation of Commandable interface in which actionPerformed() executes performCommand(null), which in turn executes the abstract method, execute(null)

Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
Serialized Form

performCommand

public void performCommand(java.lang.Object[] cmdParams)
                    throws CommandException
Perform a command and log it. This calls execute() with the given parameters.
